I don't care if your body is indestructible, don't expect today to be pleasant. I've finally captured one of you, and I won't be releasing you until your friends return what was stolen from me." Luna announced, meanwhile Harry attempted to free himself from her foot flesh.

"Wait, what do you mean by that Luna?" Harry yelled in the form of a question, straining his neck to speak up towards Luna in the hopes that she could hear him. But it was too late, Luna thought him to be impervious to death and had already decided on harsh punishments for the suspected shoe thief.

Luna scrunched her toes, wiggling them about as a breeze of fresh air washed over them. It was cold, but she didn't mind, it was the last time she would experience this for a while as she gazed down at the Nargle, stuck to the bottom of her foot like gum. "You've done a naughty thing you little thief, and must be punished accordingly. I don't know why you see fit to steal my socks and shoes, maybe for housing and shelter or some other reason, but I'm quite fed up with it now. If you want to live in them so badly, then I would have allowed it so long as I get to use them during the day. Unfortunately, you did ask for my opinion and will now be disciplined, if you little things enjoy the smell of my feet so much then maybe you should just live in my shoes all the time, including the times where I'm wearing them." Luna finished, sinking Harry's hopes of escape as she ended her lengthy statement.

The blonde Ravenclaw paused for a moment, bending down to pick up her shoes from the floor before sitting on her bed, raising Harry into the air with her foot, giving him a good look around the room to see that they were indeed alone, meaning that nobody but Luna herself would be able to come to his rescue. "Luna, Luna!" He continued to yell as loud as he could, only coming across as a squeak to the blonde's ear, a sound typically made by Nargles.

"I hope you don't mind, all your little friends already ran off with all my socks. So, I'm afraid you'll only have my foot to keep you company until your friends return what rightfully belongs to me." Luna said sternly, bringing her shoe under her foot, Harry looking down to see a dark moist cave below, her toes drumming on its entrance as the smell up foot sweat rose to greet him. Unable to do anything at all as Luna quickly slid her foot into place, trapping Harry under the sweaty mass of her foot flesh, his back sinking into her worn-down insole, making him think "What kind of creature would want to steal these sneakers?" They were at least a year or maybe even two old, dirty, and marred with an eternal impression of Luna's foot.

She pressed him down hard with her sole, ensuring that he could not escape as she tied her sneakers tightly with a double knot only on the shoe Harry was in. Making it hard for him to breathe as she pulled him against her foot by tugging on the laces. Finally giving him some space as she focused her attention on putting on her second shoe. In the end, she felt kinda bad for the Nargle, realizing at the same time that he had to be punished for his transgressions against her. But she also felt sorry for enjoying it so much, the ticklish sensation against her sole was quite pleasant, making her wish that she had a second one for her other foot.

What will Luna do next?

1. Luna goes for a walk around the castle, hoping to get Harry better acquainted with his new life as her insole. Being sure to take a thorough tour of Hogwarts.

2. Harry tries to take out his wand to apparate himself out of Luna's shoe. However, Luna twists her foot down on him, causing him to be teleport-ed between her toes as a result of the spell rebounding, losing his wand in the process.

3. Harry tries different ways to get Luna's attention while she goes to talk to Hermione, who notices something is off when he see's only one of Luna's sneakers are double knotted.
15122.title: Lovegood's Foot Trap

1513.content:
Second Set:

1. Harry tries to use some form of magic "to be closer to Cho" leading to him being shrunk and is laying inside one of her bra cups on her bed right before she puts it on.

2. Upset at Umbridge for halting her studies and taking over the school, Hermione decides to shrink Hogwarts new Headmaster down to the more fitting size of a fly inside her office.
1513.title: Alohamora: Second Set

choices: Luck does not come from potions!
152.content:
The sixth year has arrived for the young Harry Potter, a year that turns out to be full of revelations! After fighting Voldemort and his followers during the fifth year, Harry has been shocked and doesn't want to go through this again. However, he will have to face it sooner or later. Right now the awful Bellatrix Lestrange and her men are hunting down the young boy, in order to give full power to their master Voldemort. But Harry is currently at Hogwarts, under the protection of Dumbledore and the Aurors. He's the center of attention for everyone, which may be upsetting for some.

(Harry may be able to get out of Hogwarts as long as they run into people known from the Harry Potter Saga.)

How is Harry's year going to go?

1. Before the famous quidditch match Harry wins a potion nicknamed "Felix Felicis", liquid luck that allows the person who drinks it to be lucky in all points. But a mistake will happen and Harry will drink something else, something special...

2. While traveling on the Hogwarts Express, Harry tries to spy on Draco, he thinks he is working for Voldemort. But while he is spying, Draco will notice him and discreetly cast a spell on him, no one will see Harry.

3. Harry is at the Weasley's burrow, he spends the night at their house before going to Hogwarts, but during the night something will happen and Harry will wake up.
152.title: Harry Potter & Half Blood Prince

153.content:
Things are not at all well in the Wizarding World this year - the Ministry of Magic has been infiltrated, muggles are being slain by Death Eaters, Snatchers prowl the streets, and our trio of young heroes are in a desperate race to find and destroy Voldemort's remaining horcruxes before it's too late... What fates await them?

1. In the escape from Privet Drive, Mad-Eye Moody's batch of Polyjuice potion doesn't work properly, so the gathered witches and wizards of the Order of the Phoenix resolve to shrink Harry instead, giving him to Hermione, Ginny, Fleur, or perhaps Nymphadora Tonks for safe-keeping during the flight.

2. During the preparations for the wedding at the Burrow, Ginny catches Harry sneaking a pervy peak at Fleur while she's getting ready. Jealous and enraged, the copper-haired witch shrinks Harry down to the size of a field mouse, deciding to punish him by trapping him someone on–or inside of–her body.
153.title: Harry Potter & The Deathly Hollows: Part 1

info.brief_description: A Harry Potter Shrinking Story that can take place during any year or event.
info.description:
Same as my other recent stories this will be a scenario based story, I want this to be fun and enjoyable for all so there are rules that will be enforced.

1. No sex for the first through third years Harry and friends attend Hogwarts, feet, vore/mouth, and sitting/back of panties content is fine though.

2. I know it might sound difficult, but do try your best to keep the characters in character, don't make them act in a way they would never behave. Not to say they have to act completely proper, but please don't jump from one extreme to another.

3. Keep chapters over a certain length while being sure to use proper grammar, punctuation, and your knowledge of the series.

4. No toilet, scat, or farting themed chapters, I don't care if you're into it. The majority of readers are not.

5. No Crossover content or OC's, not that I have much of a problem with them personally but it makes it much easier to follow up for everyone. Plus it's a better read, in my opinion, most of the time if everyone knows the character they are reading and writing about.

6. You can previously claim a chapter you wish to write and I will make sure it stays that way for up to 2 weeks. Do not write for any chapter marked with "(Reserved)" because that means it's already taken.
